English: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, To the saints who are in Ephesus, and faithful in Christ Jesus
Bahnar: Inh Pôl bơngai 'Bok Kei-Dei rơih pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist. Inh chih hơpong kơ lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei tơ Pơlei Êphêsô, lu iĕm bơngai lui kơjăp minh jơhngơ̆m minh đon hăm Yêsu Krist.

English: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Bahnar: Inh krao khan apinh 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist wei-lăng iĕm tôm tơdrong wă kơ Sư ăn kơ iĕm hiôk-hian ling-lang.

English: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
Bahnar: Bơnê kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei 'Bă Yêsu Krist Yŏng bơ̆n, yua kơ Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n tôm tơdrong hiôk 'lơ̆ng tơ plĕnh ti. Bơ̆n đei tôm tơdrong noh yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist.

English: just as He chose us in Him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before Him in love
Bahnar: Adrol kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tam mă pơjing plĕnh teh sơ̆, Sư rơih iŏk bơ̆n boih, yua kơ Yêsu Krist wă lôch tang bơ̆n. Sư rơih iŏk bơ̆n wă kơ bơ̆n jing 'lơ̆ng tơpăt huay kơ đei tơdrong yoch 'bơ̆t anăp Sư.

English: having predestined us to adoption as sons by Jesus Christ to Himself, according to the good pleasure of His will
Bahnar: Sư 'mêm kơ bơ̆n đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆ boih, Sư khan lu bơ̆n gô jing kon Sư yua kơ Sư ăn Yêsu lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang.

English: to the praise of the glory of His grace, by which He made us accepted in the Beloved.
Bahnar: Sư wă kơ bơ̆n bơnê kơ Sư 'mêm kơ bơ̆n tơpă, Kon pôm kơdih mă ăn lôch thoi noh.

English: In Him we have redemption through His blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of His grace
Bahnar: Kon pôm Sư lôch tuh pham wă huai iŏk bơ̆n, wă kơ bơ̆n klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei jô̆ yo. Tơdrong noh yua kơ Sư 'mêm na Sư ăn đĕch thoi noh.

English: which He made to abound toward us in all wisdom and prudence
Bahnar: Sư kư̆m ăn kơ bơ̆n hơgei gơh hlôh wao nhên

English: having made known to us the mystery of His will, according to His good pleasure which He purposed in Himself
Bahnar: tôm tơdrong Sư tam mă tơbăt ăn kơ đe đơ̆ng sơ̆. Tơdrong noh Sư wă ăn Yêsu Krist pơgơ̆r tôm tơdrong tơ plĕnh hăm tơ ala teh âu mă gô trŏ kơ năr Sư pơkă ei sơ̆.

English: that in the dispensation of the fullness of the times He might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven and which are on earth—in Him.
Bahnar: tôm tơdrong Sư tam mă tơbăt ăn kơ đe đơ̆ng sơ̆. Tơdrong noh Sư wă ăn Yêsu Krist pơgơ̆r tôm tơdrong tơ plĕnh hăm tơ ala teh âu mă gô trŏ kơ năr Sư pơkă ei sơ̆.

English: In Him also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestined according to the purpose of Him who works all things according to the counsel of His will
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei pơm tôm tơdrong kiơ̆ thoi Sư đêl pơkă lê̆ boih, na tơdrong Sư ăn Yêsu lôch tang bơ̆n, hăm rơih iŏk wă kơ bơ̆n jing kon Sư, noh Sư pơkă lê̆ đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆ boih.

English: that we who first trusted in Christ should be to the praise of His glory.
Bahnar: Sư pơm thoi noh, Sư wă kơ bơ̆n ư-ang tơdrong Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă, na mă nhôn bơngai Juđê lui kơ 'Bok Krist hơdrol kơ lu bơngai nai kư̆m thoi iĕm, iĕm thoi nhôn.

English: In Him you also trusted, after you heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation; in whom also, having believed, you were sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise
Bahnar: Na sơ̆ lăp iĕm kơtơ̆ng đe bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Sư wă kơ iĕm klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch, na iĕm lui hloi kơ tơdrong đe bơtho noh. 'Bơ̆t noh iĕm đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei jur oei păng iĕm kư̆m thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă khan wă ăn sơ̆, na iĕm mơn kơdih iĕm jing kon Sư păng pôm đon hăm Kon Sư Yêsu Krist.

English: who is the guarantee of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, to the praise of His glory.
Bahnar: Dang ei yua kơ bơ̆n đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Sư, na bơ̆n băt kơ ning-mônh bơ̆n gô đei tôm tơdrong đêl Sư pơkă khan wă ăn kơ bơ̆n, na bơnê kơ Sư tơpă.

English: Therefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints
Bahnar: Thoi noh boih na inh ling-lang krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, yua kơ inh kơtơ̆ng đe khan iĕm oei lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu kơjăp, hăm iĕm băt 'mêm mơnat kơ tơduă bôl buăl kon 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: do not cease to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers
Bahnar: Thoi noh boih na inh ling-lang krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, yua kơ inh kơtơ̆ng đe khan iĕm oei lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu kơjăp, hăm iĕm băt 'mêm mơnat kơ tơduă bôl buăl kon 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give to you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of Him
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei 'Bă Yêsu Krist Yŏng bơ̆n, Sư 'Bă tơm kơ đĭ-đăng păng Sư Yang tih tơpă, na inh ưh kơ hiơt krao khan apinh Sư tơgŭm iĕm hơgei, hăm tơhlôh ăn kơ iĕm tôm tơdrong Sư.

English: the eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that you may know what is the hope of His calling, what are the riches of the glory of His inheritance in the saints
Bahnar: Inh apinh Sư pơih jơhngơ̆m đon iĕm, wă kơ iĕm hlôh băt tôm tơdrong hiôk 'lơ̆ng, thoi Sư pơkă khan wă ăn kơ bơ̆n bơngai mă Sư krao ăn jing kon Sư.

English: and what is the exceeding greatness of His power toward us who believe, according to the working of His mighty power
Bahnar: Păng wă kơ iĕm băt kơ Sư Kră Yang mơsêh tăp pang mơyang tăp dăr gơh tơgŭm lu bơ̆n bơngai lui kơ Sư

English: which He worked in Christ when He raised Him from the dead and seated Him at His right hand in the heavenly places
Bahnar: kư̆m thoi Sư gơh tơiung arih Yêsu đơ̆ng lôch atŏk tơ plĕnh oei gah 'ma kơ Sư

English: far above all principality and power and might and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this age but also in that which is to come.
Bahnar: na ăn kơ Sư pơgơ̆r tôm lu 'bok pơgơ̆r, lu linh jang, lu yang nai, tôm kơ lu Sư pơgơ̆r mă pơgơ̆r dang ei, mă pơgơ̆r ning-mônh dah layơ tă Yêsu pơgơ̆r ngăl.

English: And you He made alive, who were dead in trespasses and sins
Bahnar: Sơ̆ iĕm dang lôch yua kơ tơdrong yoch hăm dôm tơdrong kơnê̆ iĕm oei juăt kơ pơm.

English: in which you once walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit who now works in the sons of disobedience
Bahnar: Iĕm pơm kiơ̆ thoi lu bơngai tơ ala teh, hăm pơm kiơ̆ kơ yang Satan wă; yang Satan boih yŏng pơgơ̆r lu yang kơnê̆, sư boih pơgơ̆r lu bơngai mă ưh kơ chu 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: among whom also we all once conducted ourselves in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind, and were by nature children of wrath, just as the others.
Bahnar: Mă đĭ kơ nhôn bơngai Juđê kư̆m pơm thoi noh mơ̆n sơ̆. Nhôn kư̆m hưch hanh kơ tơdrong âu tơdrong to, pơm kiơ̆ kơ nhôn wă kơdih kơnê̆ dêh, trŏ kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei hil thoi lu bơngai nai tơpă.

English: But God, who is rich in mercy, because of His great love with which He loved us
Bahnar: Mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư oei 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n tơpă

English: even when we were dead in trespasses, made us alive together with Christ (by grace you have been saved)
Bahnar: mă khan bơ̆n bơngai dang lôch yua kơ tơdrong yoch, mă-lei dang ei bơ̆n kư̆m dang Sư tơiung lu bơ̆n thoi Yêsu Krist boih. Bơ̆n gơh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch yua kơ Sư mơnat ăn.

English: and raised us up together, and made us sit together in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n kư̆m dang 'Bok Kei-Dei atŏk tơ plĕnh hơdai hăm Yêsu Krist boih. Păng dang bơ̆n oei hơdai hăm Sư tơ plĕnh, yua kơ bơ̆n pôm đon pơgơ̆p hơdai hăm Yêsu Krist.

English: that in the ages to come He might show the exceeding riches of His grace in His kindness toward us in Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na Sư gô ăn kơ bơ̆n tôm tơdrong hiôk 'lơ̆ng khŏm khŏm truh tơ ning-mônh ưh kơ layơ tôch yua kơ Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n, na ăn kơ Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n.

English: For by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God
Bahnar: Bơ̆n klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch oei hiôk hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei, yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n na Sư pơklaih, yua kơ bơ̆n lui păng gơnang kơ Yêsu tơpă na Sư mơnat. Ưh kơ sĭ bơ̆n gơh klaih kơdih ôh, mă-lei tơdrong noh Sư ăn đĕch.

English: not of works, lest anyone should boast.
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh na bơ̆n 'nĕ kơ pơang kơ đe khan bơ̆n kĕ kiơ̆ tôm tơdrong juăt na bơ̆n klaih.

English: For we are His workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand that we should walk in them.
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ bơ̆n jing bơngai 'nao, yua kơ bơ̆n pôm đon hăm Yêsu Krist. Tơdrong bơ̆n jing bơngai 'nao noh Sư wă kơ bơ̆n pơm tôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl, na blŭng-a sơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ bơ̆n pơm 'lơ̆ng ling-lang thoi noh.

English: Therefore remember that you, once Gentiles in the flesh—who are called Uncircumcision by what is called the Circumcision made in the flesh by hands
Bahnar: Lu iĕm adrĕch adrung bơngai nai păng ưh kơ băt kiơ̆ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei; na lu bơngai Juđê nhôn pơjăm iĕm khan bơngai ưh kơ băt kăt tơdra akar, mă-lei tơdrong lu nhôn kăt tơdra akar noh kư̆m ưh kơ yua kiơ ôh, yua kơ ti pơm tơ 'ngoaih đĕch.

English: that at that time you were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope and without God in the world.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ iĕm ưh tam mă đei 'Bok Krist, iĕm ưh tam mă jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi lu bơngai Juđê. Dôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă wă tơgŭm lu bơngai Juđê, iĕm kư̆m ưh kơ đei. Iĕm ưh kơ đei bu wă tơgŭm. Iĕm ưh kơ băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư thoi yơ.

English: But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far off have been brought near by the blood of Christ.
Bahnar: Mă-lei mă khan iĕm ataih đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei dang noh sơ̆, dang ei truh tơ Sư boih, yua kơ Yêsu Krist lôch tuh pham tang iĕm tơ 'long pơglang, pơm kơ iĕm jing minh jơhngơ̆m minh đon hăm Sư.

English: For He Himself is our peace, who has made both one, and has broken down the middle wall of separation
Bahnar: Sơ̆ lu bơngai Juđê hăm lu bơngai nai areh dih băl tơpă. Mă-lei Yêsu Krist pơm 'long sơlam kơ bơ̆n, ăn kơ bơ̆n jing hiôk dih băl, ưh pă đei kiơ pĕng tŏk-bŏk bơ̆n dơ̆ng.

English: having abolished in His flesh the enmity, that is, the law of commandments contained in ordinances, so as to create in Himself one new man from the two, thus making peace
Bahnar: Yua kơ akâu Sư kơdih lôch tang đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n, mă bơngai Juđê, mă bơngai nai, na tơdrong juăt sơ̆ mă pơm kơ bơ̆n tơklah băl, dang ei ưh pă kăl kơ tơdrong juăt 'noh dơ̆ng boih; yua kơ tơdrong juăt 'noh sơ̆ pơm kơ bơ̆n tơklah băl jing 'bar khŭl. 'Bar khŭl 'noh sơ̆ dang ei pơm jing minh ưh pă areh băl boih

English: and that He might reconcile them both to God in one body through the cross, thereby putting to death the enmity.
Bahnar: yua kơ Sư lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang ăn đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n mă bơngai Juđê, mă bơngai nai gơh hiôk hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei boih. Bơ̆n dang minh akâu đĕch ưh pă layơ wă tơklah băl dơ̆ng.

English: And He came and preached peace to you who were afar off and to those who were near.
Bahnar: Yêsu Krist jur bơtho tơdrong hiôk-hian kơ lu iĕm bơngai nai mă ataih kơ Sư sơ̆; lu bơngai Juđê mă ưh kơ ataih kơ Sư, Sư kư̆m bơtho mơ̆n.

English: For through Him we both have access by one Spirit to the Father.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Sư boih na đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n mă bơngai Juđê, mă bơngai nai băt gơnang kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng anhăk ba bơ̆n truh tơ 'Bă bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Now, therefore, you are no longer strangers and foreigners, but fellow citizens with the saints and members of the household of God
Bahnar: Thoi noh nhôn lăng iĕm dang ei ưh pă thoi tơmoi nai boih, nhôn lăng iĕm thoi 'nhŏng oh pôm pơlei pơla, yua kơ bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei ngăl boih.

English: having been built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ Himself being the chief cornerstone
Bahnar: Bơ̆n thoi đe pơtăm keh minh pôm hnam. Lu jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu hăm lu bơngai pơtruh nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei lu sư thoi lu jrăng pơtăm tŏk-bŏk, na Yêsu Sư thoi jrăng mum.

English: in whom the whole building, being fitted together, grows into a holy temple in the Lord
Bahnar: Đĭ dôm lu 'long hnam noh pơ̆ng pơlăp tơ jrăng mum noh bruơ̆ng keh minh pôm hnam tih rŏ, pơyơ̆r kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: in whom you also are being built together for a dwelling place of God in the Spirit.
Bahnar: Lu iĕm kư̆m dang 'long hnam pơ̆ng pơlăp tơ jrăng mum noh mơ̆n. Đĭ-đăng kơ iĕm hăm lu 'nhŏng oh lu bơngai lui nai dang pơm keh minh pôm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng oei.

English: For this reason I, Paul, the prisoner of Christ Jesus for you Gentiles
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh na inh Pôl oei krao khan tơgŭm iĕm ling-lang. Inh oei lăm hnam phak noh yua kơ inh jang tơdrong Yêsu Krist bơtho tơgŭm iĕm bơngai khŭl nai.

English: if indeed you have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which was given to me for you
Bahnar: Iĕm băt boih 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjao kơ inh jang tơdrong Sư noh, wă kơ inh gơh tơgŭm iĕm.

English: how that by revelation He made known to me the mystery (as I have briefly written already
Bahnar: Sư tơbăt ăn kơ inh tơdrong mă đe ưh tam mă băt đơ̆ng sơ̆, tơdrong mă inh chih roi tơ kơpal 'noh hei.

English: by which, when you read, you may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)
Bahnar: Iĕm đŏk lăng boih na iĕm băt hloi kơ inh hlôh tôm tơdrong Yêsu Krist.

English: which in other ages was not made known to the sons of men, as it has now been revealed by the Spirit to His holy apostles and prophets
Bahnar: Adrol sơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh tam mă tơbăt ăn kơ đe ôh tơdrong noh. Mă-lei dang ei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơbăt ăn kơ lu jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu hăm lu bơngai pơtruh nơ̆r Sư boih.

English: that the Gentiles should be fellow heirs, of the same body, and partakers of His promise in Christ through the gospel
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'noh lĕch đơ̆ng tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Yêsu Krist, na lu iĕm bơngai khŭl nai dang ei kư̆m hơdai đei tơdrong hiôk jơnap noh. Tơdrong hiôk jơnap noh sơ̆ Sư khan wă ăn kơ lu bơngai Juđê nhôn mă dang ei đei truh tơ iĕm boih; bơ̆n dang 'nhŏng oh minh sĕch minh akar. Iĕm klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch oei hiôk jơnap hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei kư̆m thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ lu nhôn mơ̆n.

English: of which I became a minister according to the gift of the grace of God given to me by the effective working of His power.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ inh roi tơbăt kơ đe tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng noh, na Sư ăn kơ inh jơhngơ̆m pran wă kơ inh kĕ păng gơh jang tơdrong 'noh ling-lang. Sư pơjao kơ inh tơdrong jang noh yua kơ Sư mơnat.

English: To me, who am less than the least of all the saints, this grace was given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ
Bahnar: Inh âu bơngai iĕ hloh kơ đĭ-đăng lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei nai. Mă-lei Sư pơjao kơ inh tơdrong bơtho, wă kơ inh năm bơtho lu bơngai khŭl nai mă ưh kơ trŏ kơ bơngai khŭl Juđê, wă kơ lu sư băt kơnăl kơ tơdrong hiôk jơnap Yêsu Krist ăn kơ bơ̆n thoi yơ. Tơdrong hiôk jơnap noh hiôk tơpă ưh pă băt dang yơ.

English: and to make all see what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the ages has been hidden in God who created all things through Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong Sư wă tơgŭm bơ̆n Sư tơbăt ăn kơ inh, wă kơ inh năm tơbăt ăn kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai. 'Bok Kei-Dei Yang mă pơjing tôm tơdrong Sư wă tơgŭm bơ̆n tơpă tơdrong noh, mă ưh tam mă tơbăt ăn kơ đe đơ̆ng sơ̆.

English: to the intent that now the manifold wisdom of God might be made known by the church to the principalities and powers in the heavenly places
Bahnar: Mă dang ei Sư ăn kơ lu bơngai lui kơ Kon Sư tơbăt ăn kơ lu yŏng pơgơ̆r lu linh jang, tơbăt ăn kơ lu yŏng pơgơ̆r oei tơ kơpal plĕnh wă kơ lu sư băt kơ tơdrong tơchĕng 'Bok Kei-Dei hơgei tơpă wă tơgŭm kon bơngai.

English: according to the eternal purpose which He accomplished in Christ Jesus our Lord
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong Sư wă tơgŭm bơ̆n Sư tơchĕng đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆ boih, na dang ei 'blep kơ Kon Sư Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist jur tơgŭm lu bơ̆n thoi noh tơpă.

English: in whom we have boldness and access with confidence through faith in Him.
Bahnar: Yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu boih, na bơ̆n băt kơ pôm đon hăm Sư, bơ̆n gơh tŏk truh tơ 'Bok Kei-Dei huay pă hli kơ Sư boih.

English: Therefore I ask that you do not lose heart at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na inh apinh iĕm 'nĕ kơ sơ'ngon kơ tơdrong inh pơmat yua kơ iĕm. Inh oei tơ lăm hnam phak kư̆m bưh mơ̆n yua kơ inh wă adrin bơtho tơgŭm iĕm; na iĕm athei hiôk bĕ.

English: For this reason I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh na inh sơtơ̆p kŭl-tăng krao khan kơ 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei

English: from whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named
Bahnar: yua kơ Sư 'Bă kơ đĭ-đăng plĕnh teh.

English: that He would grant you, according to the riches of His glory, to be strengthened with might through His Spirit in the inner man
Bahnar: Sư đei tôm tĕch tơdrong na inh apinh Sư ăn kơ iĕm Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Sư oei hơdai hăm iĕm wă kơ iĕm đei jơhngơ̆m pran.

English: that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; that you, being rooted and grounded in love
Bahnar: Păng inh kư̆m apinh Yêsu Krist mơ̆t oei lăm jơhngơ̆m iĕm yua kơ iĕm lui kơ Sư. Păng inh apinh Sư ăn kơ iĕm đei đon 'mêm mơnat kơ bôl buăl lăm tôm tơdrong

English: may be able to comprehend with all the saints what is the width and length and depth and height
Bahnar: păng ăn kơ iĕm hlôh băt tơdrong Yêsu Krist 'mêm kơeng kơ bơ̆n tih-tin sư dang yơ, jrŭ să sư dang yơ, kư̆m thoi Sư tơbăt ăn kơ đĭ-đăng lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei nai.

English: to know the love of Christ which passes knowledge; that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.
Bahnar: Inh apinh Sư ăn kơ iĕm băt kơ Yêsu 'mêm kơ bơ̆n tih tơpă, mă ưh kơ băt tih dang yơ, jrŭ să sư dang yơ. Păng inh kư̆m apinh 'Bok Kei-Dei oei lăm jơhngơ̆m rim 'nu kơ lu iĕm.

English: Now to Him who is able to do exceedingly abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that works in us
Bahnar: Bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei Kră Yang mơsêh tăp pang mơyang tăp dăr tơgŭm bơ̆n lơ hloh kơ đêl bơ̆n apinh, lơ hloh kơ đêl đon bơ̆n tơchĕng.

English: to Him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus to all generations, forever and ever. Amen.
Bahnar: Na bĕ đĭ-đăng kơ lu bơ̆n kon Sư ư-ang anăn Sư, kư̆m thoi Yêsu Krist ư-ang anăn Sư, ling-lang khŏm khŏm ưh kơ layơ tôch. A-men.

English: I, therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you to walk worthy of the calling with which you were called
Bahnar: Inh bơngai oei tơ lăm hnam phak yua kơ inh wă adrin jang tơdrong Kră Yang Yêsu Krist. Mă tôm tơdrong inh wă kơ iĕm ngôi mă 'lơ̆ng ngôi mă tơpăt, yua kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei rơih iŏk iĕm boih ăn kơ iĕm jing kon Sư, hăm ăn kơ iĕm dôm tơdrong mă inh 'nao roi kơ iĕm 'noh hei, na iĕm athei adrin pơm mă 'lơ̆ng pơm mă tơpăt tơpă.

English: with all lowliness and gentleness, with longsuffering, bearing with one another in love
Bahnar: Inh wă kơ iĕm gơh găt thoi lu bơngai dim, băt 'mêm kơ bôl buăl, pơma dơnuh dih băl mă hiôk, pơlung dih băl mă 'lơ̆ng.

English: endeavoring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei adrin oei hiôk hơdai hăm bôl buăl, yua kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn kơ bơ̆n jing minh jơhngơ̆m minh đon rim 'nu kơ bơ̆n lei-lăi ngăl.

English: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you were called in one hope of your calling
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n jing minh jơhngơ̆m minh đon yua kơ bơ̆n đei minh 'nu Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng oei lăm jơhngơ̆m lu bơ̆n. Na 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ bơ̆n minh tơdrong chang gô kư̆m lei-lăi mơ̆n.

English: one Lord, one faith, one baptism
Bahnar: Bơ̆n kư̆m đei lăp minh 'nu Yŏng Tơ'ngla đĕch, na minh tơdrong lui bơ̆n, lui lei-lăi ngăl. Tơdrong bơ̆n iŏk 'batem kư̆m lei-lăi mơ̆n.

English: one God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
Bahnar: Kră Yang bơ̆n kư̆m lăp minh 'nu 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch, Sư 'Bă tơm kơ đĭ-đăng. Sư boih tih hloh, Sư pơgơ̆r đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n, tơgŭm đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n, oei hơdai đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n.

English: But to each one of us grace was given according to the measure of Christ’s gift.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng năr bơ̆n pơtơm lui lăp pôm tơdrong hơgei đĕch Yêsu ăn kơ bơ̆n phara.

English: Therefore He says: “When He ascended on high, He led captivity captive, And gave gifts to men.”
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'noh kư̆m thoi đe chih khan lê̆ tơ lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei sơ̆ thoi âu: “Lăp Sư tŏk tơ plĕnh ti Sư anhăk ba lơ lu bơngai bơnă mă đêl ayăt kơ Sư, păng Sư asong tơmam ăn kơ dôm lu bơngai mă Sư 'mêm.”

English: (Now this, “He ascended”—what does it mean but that He also first descended into the lower parts of the earth?
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt kơ Sư tŏk tơ plĕnh boih, bơ̆n kư̆m băt mơ̆n Sư jur sơ̆ truh tơ dêh atâu sŭng, wă khan adrol kơ Sư tŏk tơ plĕnh.

English: He who descended is also the One who ascended far above all the heavens, that He might fill all things.)
Bahnar: Sư jur tơ noh boih, Sư kư̆m tŏk tơ kơpal kơ plĕnh, wă khan Sư pơgơ̆r jơ̆p-jang kơ plĕnh teh jơ̆p-jang kơ anih.

English: And He Himself gave some to be apostles, some prophets, some evangelists, and some pastors and teachers
Bahnar: Na jô̆ gah tơdrong Sư asong kơ lu bơngai mă Sư 'mêm, Sư asong ăn tơdrong jang Sư, mơ'nah pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Sư, mơ'nah chă pơtruh nơ̆r Sư, mơ'nah pơm 'bok bơtho năm chă bơtho đe, mơ'nah pơm 'bok bơtho wei-lăng lu bơngai lui kơtă pơlei.

English: for the equipping of the saints for the work of ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ
Bahnar: Sư chă asong đe thoi noh Sư wă kơ lu bơngai jang noh tơgŭm đĭ-đăng lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei lui kơjăp gơh jang tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Thoi noh na đĭ-đăng lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei jing pôm đon hăm Yêsu Krist rai đunh rai wơ̆.

English: till we all come to the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God, to a perfect man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n jing pôm đon yua kơ minh tơdrong lui băt kơdih kơdih tơdrong Yêsu Kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, na bơ̆n gô jing bơngai wơ̆ tôch tơ̆l thoi Yêsu.

English: that we should no longer be children, tossed to and fro and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the trickery of men, in the cunning craftiness of deceitful plotting
Bahnar: Thoi noh na bơ̆n ưh pă gơh kiơ̆ thoi lu bơngai hơ'lơ̆p lui kơ đe bơtho tơdrong kư̆ kă boih, pơtih gia đe hơlĕnh kơ bơ̆n, dah pơhlŭ bơ̆n, wă kơ bơ̆n hơwơ̆l jing jrok kư̆ kă.

English: but, speaking the truth in love, may grow up in all things into Him who is the head—Christ
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh na bơ̆n athei pơma tơpăt ngăl ling-lang, athei đei đon băt 'mêm mơnat kơ bôl buăl, na rai đunh rai wơ̆ lăm tôm tơdrong, wă kơ bơ̆n jing pôm đon hăm Yêsu Krist. Yêsu Krist Sư pơm tơm kơ bơ̆n thoi lĕ kơ kơ̆l

English: from whom the whole body, joined and knit together by what every joint supplies, according to the effective working by which every part does its share, causes growth of the body for the edifying of itself in love.
Bahnar: na lu bơ̆n thoi lĕ kơ akâu hăm jơ̆ng ti Sư. Yua kơ Sư na đĭ kơ lơ̆m trôm akâu bơ̆n jing pơgơ̆p băl, na mưh akâu bơ̆n sư wă jang na sư jang hrơ̆p hơdai hloi. Na lơ̆m trôm akâu bơ̆n rai đunh rai wơ̆ băt 'mêm mơnat dih băl.

English: This I say, therefore, and testify in the Lord, that you should no longer walk as the rest of the Gentiles walk, in the futility of their mind
Bahnar: Âu inh wă bơtho kơ lu iĕm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei, wă kơ iĕm mơ̆ng inh păng pơm kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r inh pơma. Lu iĕm 'nĕ pă pơm thoi lu buăl iĕm mă ưh kơ lui. Lu sư tơchĕng kư̆ kă

English: having their understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God, because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart
Bahnar: đon lu sư ưh kơ hlôh. Lu sư ataih đơ̆ng tơdrong arih 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ lu iĕm, yua kơ lu sư kơtul jing arăng kơ̆l.

English: who, being past feeling, have given themselves over to lewdness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai yoch noh, lu sư ưh kơ băt kơ mơlâu. Lu sư pơm kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m lu sư wă đĕch. Lu sư pơm lơ tơdrong kơnê̆ 'mê̆-'mach.

English: But you have not so learned Christ
Bahnar: Lu iĕm pơhrăm iŏk tơdrong 'Bok Krist ưh kơ thoi tơdrong lu bơngai 'noh ôh.

English: if indeed you have heard Him and have been taught by Him, as the truth is in Jesus
Bahnar: Tơpă đe bơtho iĕm tơdrong Yêsu; dah iĕm lui kơ Yêsu, đe tơbăt kơ iĕm tơdrong Sư.

English: that you put off, concerning your former conduct, the old man which grows corrupt according to the deceitful lusts
Bahnar: Iĕm athei lê̆ tơdrong so, tơdrong mă iĕm juăt kơ pơm sơ̆. Pơm thoi noh sơ̆ rai đunh rai răm yua kơ 'maih pơm lơ tơdrong kơnê̆.

English: and be renewed in the spirit of your mind
Bahnar: Thoi noh na iĕm athei tơplih jơhngơ̆m đon 'nao

English: and that you put on the new man which was created according to God, in true righteousness and holiness.
Bahnar: na jing bơngai 'nao, bơngai mă 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjing hơbŏ thoi Sư, wă kơ bơ̆n pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt kiơ̆ thoi Sư wă.

English: Therefore, putting away lying, “Let each one of you speak truth with his neighbor,” for we are members of one another.
Bahnar: Thoi noh iĕm 'nĕ kơ hơlĕnh; iĕm athei pơma tơpăt hăm lu 'nhŏng oh iĕm, yua kơ đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n jing 'nhŏng oh lăm khŭl lui kơ Yêsu Krist ngăl.

English: “Be angry, and do not sin”: do not let the sun go down on your wrath
Bahnar: Dah iĕm đei tơdrong ơh, iĕm 'nĕ kơ pơm kơnê̆ kơ sư, 'nĕ tơhil băl đunh truh kơ măng

English: nor give place to the devil.
Bahnar: hli kơ yang kơnê̆ pơhlŭ iĕm.

English: Let him who stole steal no longer, but rather let him labor, working with his hands what is good, that he may have something to give him who has need.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă juăt kơ tơtông, 'nĕ pă tơtông dơ̆ng thoi đêl; athei jang hrat kơdih wă kơ đei tơmam sa kơdih hăm tơgŭm lu bơngai dơnuh hoh.

English: Let no corrupt word proceed out of your mouth, but what is good for necessary edification, that it may impart grace to the hearers.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ kơ pơma kơnê̆, athei pơma mă 'lơ̆ng tơgŭm pơyua lu bơngai mă mơ̆ng iĕm.

English: And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ kơ pơm kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng sơ'ngon kơ iĕm, yua kơ Sư oei lăm iĕm, dang Sư chơ̆m đŏng yâu tơ klĕng bơ̆n tơbăt kơ bơ̆n bơngai klaih gơh oei hăm Sư ning-mônh.

English: Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, clamor, and evil speaking be put away from you, with all malice.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei lê̆ đĭ dôm tơdrong tơhil pơma ôr pơret, tơdrong ơh lăm jơhngơ̆m pơma kơnê̆ kơ đe, hăm đĭ dôm tơdrong khĕnh hơwĕng.

English: And be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God in Christ forgave you.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei pơm băl mă 'lơ̆ng, băt 'mêm mơnat kơ bôl buăl, 'nĕ kơ jô̆ yo dih băl thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei huay kơ jô̆ yo kơ bơ̆n yua kơ Kon Sư Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n.

English: Therefore be imitators of God as dear children.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei, 'Bok Kei-Dei Sư 'mêm kơ bơ̆n tơpă, na bơ̆n athei pơm rok Sư.

English: And walk in love, as Christ also has loved us and given Himself for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling aroma.
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n athei băt 'mêm mơnat kơ bôl buăl, thoi Yêsu Krist 'mêm mơnat kơ bơ̆n mah ăn akâu Sư kơdih lôch tang bơ̆n. Sư pơyơ̆r akâu Sư kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei jur lôch tang bơ̆n tơ 'long pơglang kiơ̆ thoi 'Bok Kei-Dei lăp đon, thoi lu bơngai soi sơmah kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei lu sư pơyơ̆r dôm tơmam 'bâu phu.

English: But fornication and all uncleanness or covetousness, let it not even be named among you, as is fitting for saints
Bahnar: Gah tơdrong pơm pơyô ngôi kư̆ kă, hưch hanh lơ tơdrong, dôm tơdrong noh bơ̆n 'nĕ kơ pơma 'bơm tŏ sĕt, yua kơ bơ̆n jing kon 'Bok Kei-Dei boih.

English: neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor coarse jesting, which are not fitting, but rather giving of thanks.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n ưh pă gơh pơma tơdrong kơnê̆, tơdrong kư̆ kă, tơdrong chroih tơ nai. Bơ̆n athei pơma ling-lang gah tơdrong ư-ang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch.

English: For this you know, that no fornicator, unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God.
Bahnar: Dôm lu bơngai đi, lu bơngai pơm pơyô kư̆ kă, lu bơngai hưch hanh lơ tơdrong, bơ̆n băt boih lu bơngai oei pơm thoi noh ưh kơ gơh oei hơdai Yêsu Krist hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei kơplah Sư pơgơ̆r pơm Pơtao ning-mônh ôh. Lu bơngai thoi noh lu sư dang bơngai kơkuh kơ yang nai đĕch, lu sư tơchĕng tơdrong noh hloh loi kơ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Let no one deceive you with empty words, for because of these things the wrath of God comes upon the sons of disobedience.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ kơ lui kơ đe pơhlŭ iĕm kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong kơnê̆ noh mă sư khan tơdrong 'lơ̆ng. Lu bơngai thoi noh ưh kơ chu 'Bok Kei-Dei. 'Bok Kei-Dei hil tơpă kơ lu sư, gô phak lu sư.

English: Therefore do not be partakers with them.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na iĕm 'nĕ kơ pơm buăl hăm lu bơngai thoi noh.

English: For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light
Bahnar: Yua kơ dang ei iĕm ưh pă oei lăm măng mu thoi lu bơngai noh boih, iĕm oei lăm hơdah Kră Yang Yêsu Krist pơchrang ăn. Thoi noh na iĕm athei oei kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong hơdah Sư noh.

English: (for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness, righteousness, and truth)
Bahnar: Dôm lu bơngai oei lăm tơdrong hơdah, Sư gô pơm dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl.

English: finding out what is acceptable to the Lord.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei chă dôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei lăp đon noh.

English: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather expose them.
Bahnar: Iĕm 'nĕ pă kiơ̆ tơdrong măng mu, tơdrong noh tơdrong ưh kơ yua kơ bơ̆n. Bơ̆n athei tơbăt kơ đe tơdrong yoch noh mơ̆n.

English: For it is shameful even to speak of those things which are done by them in secret.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt kơ tơdrong kơnê̆ lu sư pơm noh kơnê̆ tơpă păng mơlâu ră kơ pơma 'bơm tơdrong noh.

English: But all things that are exposed are made manifest by the light, for whatever makes manifest is light.
Bahnar: Mă-lei bơ̆n athei tơbăt ăn tơdrong yoch lu sư pơm noh, wă kơ lu sư mơn kơdih, thoi bơ̆n tơ̆k ŭnh tơ'bôh kơ lu sư tơdrong yoch noh. Na lu sư gô lê̆ dôm tơdrong yoch noh, na oei kiơ̆ hloi lăm hơdah ŭnh noh.

English: Therefore He says: “Awake, you who sleep, Arise from the dead, And Christ will give you light.”
Bahnar: Tơdrong noh thoi đe juăt kơ khan: “Ơ bơngai tep dang lĕ kơ lôch, iung bĕ, na 'Bok Krist gô pơchrang hơdah ăn kơ iĕm.”

English: See then that you walk circumspectly, not as fools but as wise
Bahnar: Thoi noh na bơ̆n athei kơchăng oei mă hơđơ̆ng hli kơ jơhngơ̆m bơ̆n hơdai 'maih pơm yoch. Bơ̆n 'nĕ kơ pơm kư̆ kă thoi lu bơngai jih 'ma kơ bơ̆n, bơ̆n athei pơm thoi lu bơngai hơgei lu bơngai tơpăt đĕch trŏ.

English: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n athei adrin pơm 'lơ̆ng hăm adrin ră roi kơ đe tơdrong Yêsu Krist yua kơ dang ei đei lơ bơngai kơnê̆ tơpă.

English: Therefore do not be unwise, but understand what the will of the Lord is.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na bơ̆n athei kơchăng oei mă hơđơ̆ng 'nĕ kơ pơm thoi bơngai kơhlôh, adrol kơ wă pơm athei tơchĕng lăng 'mơ̆i wă kơ băt Kră Yang lăp đon kơ bơ̆n pơm dah ưh.

English: And do not be drunk with wine, in which is dissipation; but be filled with the Spirit
Bahnar: Bơ̆n 'nĕ kơ et sik suai hli kơ bơ̆n jing bơngai kư̆ kă; bơ̆n athei ăn kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng pơgơ̆r bơ̆n lăm tôm tơdrong.

English: speaking to one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n athei hơri bơnê kơ Kră Yang hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m, mă bơ̆n hơri tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei hơdai hăm bơngai tơpôl, mă bơ̆n hơri tơdrong lu bơngai kră sơ̆, mă bơ̆n hơri tơdrong lu bơngai dang ei, mă bơ̆n hơri kiơ̆ kơ đon bơ̆n tơchĕng kơdih.

English: giving thanks always for all things to God the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Bơ̆n athei băt bơnê kơ 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei lăm tôm tơdrong păng bơ̆n athei krao chă Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist na bơ̆n gơh krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: submitting to one another in the fear of God.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n athei chu băl yua kơ bơ̆n bơngai lui kơ Yêsu Krist.

English: Wives, submit to your own husbands, as to the Lord.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơm akăn, dang ei iĕm lui boih kơ Yêsu Krist, iĕm athei chu yom kơ klo iĕm gô mơ̆ng kơ sư pơgơ̆r.

English: For the husband is head of the wife, as also Christ is head of the church; and He is the Savior of the body.
Bahnar: Yua kơ klo iĕm sư trŏ kơ pơgơ̆r iĕm kư̆m thoi Yêsu Krist pơgơ̆r lu bơngai lui kơ Sư; Yêsu Krist Sư ăn akâu Sư kơdih pơklaih lu bơngai lui kơ Sư.

English: Therefore, just as the church is subject to Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in everything.
Bahnar: Na lu bơngai pơm akăn iĕm athei chu yom kơ klo iĕm pơgơ̆r lăm tôm tơdrong, thoi lu bơ̆n bơngai lui chu yom kơ Yêsu Krist.

English: Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ also loved the church and gave Himself for her
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơm klo kư̆m lei-lăi athei băt 'mêm kơ akăn sư kơdih thoi Yêsu 'mêm kơ bơ̆n bơngai lui kơ Sư năm ăn akâu Sư kơdih lôch tang bơ̆n

English: that He might sanctify and cleanse her with the washing of water by the word
Bahnar: wă kơ bơ̆n rơgoh đĭ kơ dôm tơdrong yoch, na pơyơ̆r bơ̆n ăn kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei wei-lăng, yua kơ bơ̆n lui kơ nơ̆r Sư bơtho, truh kơ bơ̆n iŏk 'batem tơmôch akâu bơ̆n tơ lăm đak, dang wă khan tơhoch tŭk tơdrong mơgrĭ boih iŏk tơdrong rơgoh.

English: that He might present her to Himself a glorious church, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing, but that she should be holy and without blemish.
Bahnar: Sư pơm thoi noh wă kơ bơ̆n jing bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt gơh oei hơdai hăm Sư. Bơ̆n thoi bơngai pơm akăn mă 'mêm kơ klo sư, na sư hrŭk hơbĕn ao rơgoh 'lơ̆ng ling-lang wă kơ klo sư lăp đon.

English: So husbands ought to love their own wives as their own bodies; he who loves his wife loves himself.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơm klo athei 'mêm kơ akăn sư yua kơ bre sư jing minh sĕch minh akar boih. Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ akăn sư thoi noh, bơngai noh 'mêm kơ akâu sư kơdih thoi noh mơ̆n.

English: For no one ever hated his own flesh, but nourishes and cherishes it, just as the Lord does the church.
Bahnar: Ưh kơ đei bu khan ưh kơ 'mêm kơ akâu sư kơdih ôh, đĭ-đăng bơngai tă 'mêm kơ akâu sư kơdih ngăl, thoi noh na bơ̆n băt kơ 'me sa akâu bơ̆n kơdih, băt kơ wei-lăng akâu bơ̆n kơdih, thoi Yêsu Krist wei-lăng lu bơ̆n bơngai lui kơ Sư.

English: For we are members of His body, of His flesh and of His bones.
Bahnar: Na lu bơ̆n âu boih dang akâu akar Yêsu Krist.

English: “For this reason a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife, and the two shall become one flesh.”
Bahnar: Tơdrong noh thoi đe chih khan lê̆ tơ lăm sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei sơ̆ thoi âu: “Bơngai pơm klo pơm akăn tơklah đơ̆ng mĕ 'bă sư kơdih na oei hơdai, bre sư jing minh sĕch minh akar.”

English: This is a great mystery, but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei tơbăt ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong noh kăl tơpă. Tơdrong noh wă khan Yêsu Krist hăm lu bơngai lui kơ Sư dang lĕ kơ minh sĕch minh akar boih.

English: Nevertheless let each one of you in particular so love his own wife as himself, and let the wife see that she respects her husband.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na lu bơngai pơm klo athei 'mêm kơ akăn sư thoi noh tơpă, thoi sư 'mêm kơ akâu sư kơdih. Na lu bơngai pơm akăn kư̆m lei-lăi athei băt 'mêm mơnat hăm chu yom kơ klo sư pơgơ̆r sư lăm tôm tơdrong.

English: Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai 'lơ̆p 'lŏ drŏ-nglo drŏ-kăn, iĕm athei băt chu yom kơ lu mĕ 'bă iĕm, yua kơ iĕm bơngai lui boih kơ Yêsu Krist, tơ̆ng iĕm pơm thoi noh trŏ tơpă.

English: “Honor your father and mother,” which is the first commandment with promise
Bahnar: Tơdrong juăt đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă sơ̆ đe đei chih thoi âu: “Iĕm athei chu yom kơ lu mĕ 'bă iĕm.” Tơdrong juăt Sư pơkă noh kăl tơpă na 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă khan wă tơgŭm bơ̆n dah bơ̆n chu kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong juăt Sư pơkă noh.

English: “that it may be well with you and you may live long on the earth.”
Bahnar: Sư pơkă khan dah bơ̆n chu kiơ̆ tơdrong juăt chu yom mĕ 'bă, Sư gô ăn kơ bơ̆n arih hiôk păng arih sot tơ ala teh âu.

English: And you, fathers, do not provoke your children to wrath, but bring them up in the training and admonition of the Lord.
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai đei kon hơ'lơ̆p, iĕm 'nĕ hil kơ kon iĕm dêh, hli kơ lu sư hil plơ̆ kơ iĕm dơ̆ng, iĕm athei bơtho akhan kơ lu sư kiơ̆ tơdrong Kră Yang pơkă.

English: Bondservants, be obedient to those who are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in sincerity of heart, as to Christ
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai đĭch đe, iĕm athei chu yom kơ yŏng tơ'ngla iĕm, iĕm athei jang kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r sư pơkă 'nĕ kơ pơjah dôm nơ̆r sư khan. Iĕm athei jang kơ sư mă tơpăt dang iĕm jang kơ Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist mơ̆n.

English: not with eyeservice, as men-pleasers, but as bondservants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart
Bahnar: Iĕm athei jang mă tơpă ngê̆ kiơ kơ yŏng iĕm gŏk gô na jang, iĕm kư̆ kơ jang mă 'lơ'lŏ jang mă tơpăt đĕch na 'Bok Kei-Dei bơnê. Mă khan iĕm jang kơ sư kư̆m dang jang kơ Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu mơ̆n.

English: with goodwill doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men
Bahnar: Thoi noh na iĕm athei jang kơ yŏng iĕm jang mă tơpăt đĕch, yua kơ iĕm ưh kơ sĭ khan jang wă pơhiôk kon bơngai ôh, iĕm jang wă pơhiôk Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist.

English: knowing that whatever good anyone does, he will receive the same from the Lord, whether he is a slave or free.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist wă apah bơngai bu mă jang 'lơ̆ng jang tơpăt, mă khan sư bơngai đĭch đe, mă bơngai rơngei.

English: And you, masters, do the same things to them, giving up threatening, knowing that your own Master also is in heaven, and there is no partiality with Him.
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai yŏng tơ'ngla wei lu bơngai đĭch, iĕm kư̆m pơm mă 'lơ̆ng kơ lu đĭch iĕm; mă sư ưh kơ chu 'nĕ kơ hil kơ sư dêh păng 'nĕ kơ tôn teh sư mơnat kơ sư mơ̆n. Mă iĕm bơngai yŏng tơ'ngla sư, mă sư bơngai đĭch iĕm, đĭ-đăng kơ bơ̆n đei minh 'nu Yŏng tih hloh kơ đĭ-đăng, Sư oei tơ kơpal plĕnh ti. Sư lăng đĭ-đăng bơngai lei-lăi đĕch ưh kơ đei phara kiơ ôh.

English: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord and in the power of His might.
Bahnar: Tơdrong inh chih hơpong kơ iĕm wă jê̆ tôch boih, mă-lei oei đei pă minh tơdrong âu kăl tơpă, na inh wă roi tơbăt ăn kơ iĕm: Bơ̆n athei gơnang kơ Yêsu hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m, yua kơ Sư Kră Yang mơsêh tăp pang mơyang tăp dăr gơh pơm tôm tơdrong, na wă kơ Sư tơgŭm bơ̆n gơh đei jơhngơ̆m pran.

English: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
Bahnar: Thoi kơ lu linh wă năm tơblah, lu sư chĕp tôm kơ tơmam tơblah, wă kơ tơblah jei sư, na bơ̆n kư̆m lei-lăi athei gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm bơ̆n tôm tơdrong wă kơ bơ̆n đei jơhngơ̆m pran huay kơ lui kơ yang Satan pơhlŭ.

English: For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this age, against spiritual hosts of wickedness in the heavenly places.
Bahnar: Tơdrong noh ưh kơ sĭ tơblah tơduă bơ̆n kon bơngai ôh, bơ̆n tơblah hăm lu yŏng yang kơnê̆, sư kư̆m pran mơ̆n, sư kư̆m oei tơ kơpal plĕnh ti mă tơ anih nai; sư pơgơ̆r lu bơngai oei tơ ala teh âu, lu bơngai mă oei lăm măng mu.

English: Therefore take up the whole armor of God, that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na bơ̆n athei gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm bơ̆n lăm tôm tơdrong, wă kơ bơ̆n đei jơhngơ̆m pran huay kơ hiong răm kơplah bơ̆n đei tơdrong tơblah hăm yang kơnê̆. Bơ̆n athei adrin pơjăng pơjăr dĭng truh năr tôch.

English: Stand therefore, having girded your waist with truth, having put on the breastplate of righteousness
Bahnar: Kơplah bơ̆n oei tơblah, bơ̆n athei dơ̆ng kơtă anih hloi, gơhret tơlei tơ̆n bơ̆n mă kơjăp; noh wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n đei đon tơpăt boih. Bơ̆n athei hrŭk ao mam wă pĕng akâu bơ̆n; noh wă khan bơ̆n athei pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ đe.

English: and having shod your feet with the preparation of the gospel of peace
Bahnar: Jơ̆ng bơ̆n trô̆ chơkhŏ; noh wă pơtih gia kơ jơ̆ng bơ̆n pơnam kơ nơnăm chă ră roi kơ đe tơdrong 'lơ̆ng, tơdrong hiôk.

English: above all, taking the shield of faith with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked one.
Bahnar: Athei chĕp khêl ling-lang wă tang akâu bơ̆n hli kơ 'brơ̆m ŭnh yang kơnê̆ prah 'bơm bơ̆n; 'noh wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n athei kơchăng hli kơ bơ̆n đei tơdrong pơhlŭ wă kơ bơ̆n oei kơjăp lăm tơdrong lui.

English: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God
Bahnar: Bơ̆n athei yơ̆l môk kơlăm; 'noh wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Athei iŏk chĕp đao han đơ̆ng Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng ăn; 'noh wă pơtih gia kơ bơ̆n, athei bơ̆n iŏk nơ̆r 'Bok Kei-Dei tơbăt ăn kơ đe.

English: praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, being watchful to this end with all perseverance and supplication for all the saints
Bahnar: Păng bơ̆n 'nĕ hiơt krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, wă kơ bơ̆n hưch hanh kơ tơdrong krao khan ling-lang, gô mơ̆ng kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng wă kơ bơ̆n krao khan tơdrong kiơ, krao khan tơgŭm băl tơduă lu kon 'Bok Kei-Dei dah krao khan kơ tơdrong kiơ nai.

English: and for me, that utterance may be given to me, that I may open my mouth boldly to make known the mystery of the gospel
Bahnar: Păng inh wă kơ iĕm krao khan tơgŭm inh hai mơ̆n, wă kơ inh hlôh băt dôm tơdrong Sư wă kơ inh bơtho păng wă kơ inh nuih kơ bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Sư.

English: for which I am an ambassador in chains; that in it I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
Bahnar: Sư wơh inh năm bơtho kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai. Yua kơ thoi noh na đe areh kơ inh oei chô̆ inh dang ei. Mă-lei inh wă kơ iĕm krao khan tơgŭm inh, wă kơ inh nuih oei bơtho khŏm khŏm kiơ̆ thoi Sư lăp đon.

English: But that you also may know my affairs and how I am doing, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, will make all things known to you
Bahnar: 'Bok mă chĕp ăn kơ iĕm hla kơthơ âu anăn sư Tisĭk, sư 'nhŏng oh bơngai lui bơ̆n. Bơ̆n 'mêm kơ sư mơ̆n yua kơ bơ̆n 'bôh sư adrin jang tơdrong Kră Yang Yêsu Krist tơpă. Na sư gô tơbăt ăn kơ iĕm tôm tơdrong inh oei 'lơ̆ng akâu hăm inh jang tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi yơ dang ei na iĕm gô băt.

English: whom I have sent to you for this very purpose, that you may know our affairs, and that he may comfort your hearts.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na inh wơh sư năm tơ iĕm wă kơ iĕm băt kơ nhôn oei 'lơ̆ng akâu păng wă kơ sư pơlung iĕm hiôk kơ jơhngơ̆m kơtơ̆ng tơdrong nhôn thoi yơ.

English: Peace to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Bahnar: Inh krao khan kơ 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist, apinh Sư tơgŭm đĭ-đăng kơ iĕm hiôk-hian, hăm ăn kơ iĕm băt 'mêm mơnat kơ đe, hăm lui rai kơjăp.

English: Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.
Bahnar: Inh apinh sư wei-lăng lu bơngai mă băt 'mêm kơ Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist ling-lang.
